GOD.content: [re: Kafka’s Letter to My Father] speaking for the father, spécularité sans fond, who has authority to forgive?: demanding as a surplus my innocence, which is yours because you identify w/ me
GOD.linkedContent: [re: Kafka’s Letter to My Father] speaking for the father, spécularité sans fond, who has authority to forgive?: demanding as a surplus my innocence, which is yours because you identify w/ me
